isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 2 SPEED REAR AXLES: SPICER - DESCRIPTION - HIGH RANGE

svcproc.title: HIGH RANGE
svcproc.para: In high range, the sun gear locks the planet gears with the planet plate and the ring gear. The unit then functions as a single reduction axle. Power flows in the pinion to the ring gear through the differential case to the differential cross shaft. The cross shaft transfers it through the differential pinion gears to the left and right differential side gears, and finally to the axle shafts.
